title: Cognitron: A self-organizing multilayered neural network

tldr.text: A new hypothesis for the organization of synapses between neurons is proposed: “The synapse from neuron x to neuron y is reinforced when x fires provided that no neuron in the vicinity of y is firing stronger than y”, and a new algorithm with which a multilayered neural network is effectively organized can be deduced.
